page.title: 15CLUBS.
page.content: For its size the village is well provided with clubs. For sportsmen, there is the cricket club, and a bowling club. A Sports and Social club provides pub facilities, darts and billiards. Womens clubs are the Women's Institute meeting monthly and the Mothers Union associated with the Parish church, and the Women's Fellowship for the Methodists. The young have a weekly Youth Club in the Villlage Hall. The retired people have a twice monthly club where they play cards and bingo and arrange outings. It is known as the Tuesday Club.
